entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cambridge Bay Airport 2:32 PM MDT Saturday 10 September 2016
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 76 %
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: SW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Periods of wet snow beginning before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of wet snow. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of wet snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then north 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
